name: Lavar HARRIS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Kimberly A. Barkley, Board of Secretary, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Harris v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Lavar HARRIS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Kimberly A. Barkley, Board of Secretary, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of November, 2013, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
83 A.3d 85
Lavar HARRIS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Kimberly A. Barkley, Board of Secretary, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 21, 2013.
